skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I am familiar with Python, Javascript, and Node.js. I really enjoy studying and learning algorithms, as well as solving problems on Leetcode/Hackerrank.

skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have intermediate knowledge in CSS, HTML, and React. I would like to deepen my understanding of React and learn Vue.js.

skills.title: Data Analytics
skills.description: Solving data-related problems is something I really enjoy. I have knowledge in SQL, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Tableau/PowerBI.

skills.title: AI & Machine Learning
skills.description: I'm interested in learning Machine Learning and Deep Learning because I'm very passionate about the concept, but unfortunately, I haven't had the time to delve into it deeply yet.

portfolio.title: Rede Social
portfolio.description: Social Network with a login system, encrypted password, post feed, friends list, add and remove friends feature, like system, comments, light mode, and dark mode.

portfolio.title: Leetcode
portfolio.description: My repository with the exercises I solved on LeetCode. Constantly updated.
